attributes.action: Call on MPs to pass a vote of no confidence in Speaker Bercow.
attributes.additional_details: The Speaker must remain politically impartial at all times.He has failed to remain politically impartial. In light of that, he should be asked to vacate his position,so that a new Speaker, who upholds the traditions of the House of Commons,can be elected in his place.
attributes.background:
We call on MPs to pass a vote of no confidence in Speaker Bercow. 
Mr. Bercow has banned President Trump from speaking in the Houses of Parliament.In so doing he has failed to remain politically impartial.
